property.name: loadBamFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
m.bam_id, m.reference_genome_id as bam_reference_genome_id,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.bam m JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id WHERE m.bam_id = ?

property.name: createBamFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.bam ( bam_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_id, index_id) VALUES ( :BAM_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :INDEX_ID)

property.name: searchByNameBamFileQuery
property.value: SELECT name FROM catgenome.biological_data_item WHERE name = ?
